attributes.action: Amend the current CRB system to a single universal check
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CRB (Criminal Record Bereau) checks exist to ensure those working with young people have no previous convictions that could put their charges in harm.  Unfortunately, a CRB accepted by one organisation is not accepted by another, so individuals have to get re-checked each time.  

This is often at great expense to the organisation or individual, as well as administration costs and consumed hours at the Bureau.

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to amend the current CRB system to a single universal check, possibly in the form of a driving license-style ID card, that expires every two years.
